languages.text: {n}Идира закрывает лицо руками и пытается сдержать рыдания.{/n} "С-спасибо... спасибо, {name}! Я не подведу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира закрывает лицо руками и пытается сдержать рыдания.{/n} "С-спасибо... спасибо, {name}! Я не подведу!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira covers her face with her hands and tries to hold back her sobs.{/n} "Th-Thank you... Thank you, {name}! I won't let you down!"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉捂住了脸，试着忍住啜泣。{/n}“谢——谢谢你……谢谢你，{name}！我绝不会让你失望！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira covers her face with her hands and tries to hold back her sobs.{/n} "Th-Thank you... Thank you, {name}! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉捂住了脸，试着忍住啜泣。{/n}“谢——谢谢你……谢谢你，{name}！我绝不会让你失望！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se cubre la cara con las manos e intenta contener sus sollozos.{/n} «G-gracias... ¡Gracias, {name}! ¡No le decepcionaré!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira covers her face with her hands and tries to hold back her sobs.{/n} "Th-Thank you... Thank you, {name}! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se cubre la cara con las manos e intenta contener sus sollozos.{/n} «G-gracias... ¡Gracias, {name}! ¡No le decepcionaré!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは両手で顔を覆い、嗚咽をこらえようとする。{/n}「ありがとう…ありがとう、{name}様！絶対に失望させないわ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira covers her face with her hands and tries to hold back her sobs.{/n} "Th-Thank you... Thank you, {name}! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは両手で顔を覆い、嗚咽をこらえようとする。{/n}「ありがとう…ありがとう、{name}様！絶対に失望させないわ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira vergräbt ihr Gesicht in den Händen und versucht, ihr Schluchzen zu unterdrücken.{/n} "D... danke ... Danke, {name}! Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira covers her face with her hands and tries to hold back her sobs.{/n} "Th-Thank you... Thank you, {name}! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira vergräbt ihr Gesicht in den Händen und versucht, ihr Schluchzen zu unterdrücken.{/n} "D... danke ... Danke, {name}! Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se couvre le visage des deux mains tout en s'efforçant d'étouffer un sanglot.{/n} « Me... merci... Merci infiniment, {name} ! Je ne vous décevrai pas ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira covers her face with her hands and tries to hold back her sobs.{/n} "Th-Thank you... Thank you, {name}! I won't let you down!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se couvre le visage des deux mains tout en s'efforçant d'étouffer un sanglot.{/n} « Me... merci... Merci infiniment, {name} ! Je ne vous décevrai pas ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, yüzünü elleriyle kapatıp gözyaşlarını durdurmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Te... Teşekkür ederim {name}! Yüzünü kara çıkarmayacağım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira covers her face with her hands and tries to hold back her sobs.{/n} "Th-Thank you... Thank you, {name}! I won't let you down!"
